name: ErR0r
description:
Do you enjoy parkour?

Do you enjoy turrets?

Well, this is the game for you!

ErR0r is a fast-paced 3D parkour platformer game including buttons and turrets. Jump your way through 3 gut-clenching levels and enjoy the feeling of completion, if you get there.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ErR0r was made by:

carl890 - 3D Artist.

llukee - 2D Artist & Logo Creator.

Sirdestroyer54 - Level Design.

Jaskowicz - Programming and Level Design.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credit where due:

- Transformers Font (used in title screen)

- Button Sound Effect (from http://soundbible.com/tags-button.html)
